formalpara.title: Figure 4. Free-living female of Strongyloides ratti compared to C. elegans hermaphrodite.
formalpara.para: A Hermaphrodite of C. elegans depicting double recurved gonad. B Free-living female of S. ratti depicting similar overall body size and architecture of gonad. C Diagrammatic representation of microinjection site common to both C. elegans hermaphrodites and Strongyloides free-living females. Scale bars in panels A and B = 100 μm.
